title: BOB Recruitment 2025 - Apply Offline for 03 Business Corresponding Coordinator Posts
description: The Bank of Baroda (BOB) has announced the official notification for 2025. To fill up the vacancies for 03 Business Correspondent Coordinator Jobs. Those candidates who have qualified in B.E/ B.Tech, Any Degree, MBA, MCA, M.Sc can grab this chance and apply for these posts. Here, we mentioned the age limit, selection process, salary structure, education details, application fee, and how to apply for the BOB Recruitment 2025 . Interested and eligible candidates can apply on or before the last ...
